PILOT_NOT_FLYING: Position landing lights OFF passing through 10,000 feet.

PILOT_FLYING: Set altimeters to standard at transition altitude.
PILOT_NOT_FLYING: Set altimeters to standard at transition altitude.

PILOT_FLYING: Approaching selected FMC cruise altitude, verify level off and proper mode/N1 limit annunciation.

PILOT_NOT_FLYING: Position center tank fuel pump switches OFF when both pump LOW PRESSURE lights illuminate.
During last hour of cruise on extendedâ€‘range flights, perform Fuel Crossfeed Valve check.

PILOT_FLYING: Set MCP altitude selector for descent.
PILOT_NOT_FLYING: Prior to top of descent, select and verify planned arrival procedure on the FMC.

PILOT_FLYING: At top of descent point observe descent initiated and verify proper mode annunciation.
PILOT_NOT_FLYING: At top of descent point observe descent initiated and verify proper mode annunciation.

PILOT_FLYING: Approaching selected FMC cruise altitude, verify level off and propermode/N1 limit annunciation
PILOT_NOT_FLYING: Approaching selected FMC cruise altitude, verify level off and propermode/N1 limit annunciation
